name: Double Serum Light Texture Firming & Smoothing Anti-Aging Concentrate
about: What it is:An iconic two-in-one serum with 21 plant extracts for visibly firmer, smoother, more radiant skin—now with a lightweight texture ideal for oily skin and humid climates..Skin Type:Combination and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Lightweight Serum.Highlighted Ingredients:- Turmeric: Addresses multiple visible signs of aging..Ingredient Callouts:Free of mineral oil..What Else You Need to Know:Now with a 50 percent lighter texture, this worldwide bestseller has a bare-skin finish and a dual formula that successfully combines 21 visibly youth-boosting plant extracts, both water- and oil-soluble to ensure a perfect affinity with your skin..Clinical Results:In a consumer test on 352 subjects, after 7 days:
ingredients: -Turmeric: Addresses multiple visible signs of aging..-Green Banana, Oat, Teasel, and Myrothamnus: Visibly firm and lift skin while fighting fine lines and wrinkles..-Leaf of Life: Boosts skin’s natural hydration...Aqua/Water/Eau, C9-12 Alkane, Undecane, Glycerin, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Pentylene Glycol, Tridecane, Squalane, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Butylene Glycol, Parfum/Fragrance, Dipsacus Sylvestris Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Propanediol, Silybum Marianum Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tromethamine, Tocopheryl Acetate, Escin, Carbomer, Chenopodium Quinoa Seed Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Xanthan Gum, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Leontopodium Alpinum Flower/Leaf Extract, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil Unsaponifiables, Caramel, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Disodium EDTA, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Fruit Extract, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Kalanchoe Pinnata Leaf Extract, Myrothamnus Flabellifolia.Leaf/Stem Extract, Citric Acid, Lycium Barbarum Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Maltodextrin, Orthosiphon Stamineus Extract, Hedychium Coronarium Root Extract, Salicornia Herbacea Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Leaf Extract, Jania Rubens Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ascorbic Acid, Sodium Citrate, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Engelhardtia Chrysolepis Leaf Extract, CI 14700/Red 4, Callicarpa Japonica Fruit Extract.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Smooth over a clean face and neck every morning..-Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding your eye area..-Work product downward, onto your neck and décolleté.

reviews.review_text: Unfortunately the product is full but still will not dispense. I’ve tried trying to unscrew the top or see if something is jammed but no luck. About 20 squirts gets out nothing. So sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum made my skin feel more hydrated!! It was not sticky at all!!! The only downside is that the samples were small, but that was not a deal breaker! I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: For real results, look no further
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly thank you Clarins, for letting me try this for my honest opinion. I was astonished with this serum. It's truly a game changer, there is visible changes in my skin tone and there is a clear reduction of lines and marks. The application is extremely easy and the results are out of the chart. The ingredients include organic giant provencal reed, turmeric and 5 Active molecules. This packs a punch and gives your skin the true radiance it desires. Definitely recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the chance to try Clarins Double Serum 9, and even though it came in a sample size of three 0.03 fl oz ampules, I got a glimpse of its potential. This 2-in-1 formula, powered by 22 plant extracts and 5 new pure active molecules, feels like a concentrated blend of nature’s finest. From the first application, I noticed the texture was luxuriously silky and absorbed effortlessly into my skin without any greasy residue. The light, botanical scent was refreshing and soothing, making it an enjoyable part of my skincare routine.  The packaging of the ampules is sleek and efficient—perfect for travel or trial use. The dual-chamber design ensures a balanced mix of serum with each pump, showcasing the thoughtfulness behind its development. Even though I used it three times a week, the hydration and smoothness it left behind were noticeable. However, the sample size didn’t quite allow me to experience the full anti-aging benefits that Clarins promises. I can tell, though, that with more regular use, it could definitely address lifestyle-induced aging.  What really stood out was the inclusion of Clarins Eye Lift. After using it for a longer period, I saw a visible improvement in the firmness around my eyes within a week. It was an added bonus that made me appreciate Clarins' commitment to delivering results.  While I’m giving it four stars due to the limited sample size, I’m genuinely impressed with the formula, ingredients, and luxurious feel of Double Serum 9. It’s worth considering if you’re serious about tackling the signs of aging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice feel and light pleasant scent. Just put a little the palm of your hand and rub your hands together to warm up and apply to your face and neck area. It takes a few minutes to fully dry and not feel tacky. Then you’re ready to finish your makeup routine. Visible results after using a few days. Lots of natural plant ingredients and my face feels good too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given a three day sample of this serum so it’s hard to tell if anything would happen since it would have to be used for 30 days but it was three cute little bottles filled with serum that you cracked one for one time use, the texture was nice and it smelled good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this serum is easy to use. The scent is amazing light and fresh. Makes my skin feel smooth and light.  Natural ingredients. I am excited to see the results in the next few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has excellent packaging with impressive effectiveness. I appreciate how it smooths my skin without any silicone-like residue. I use it before applying makeup, and it provides even hydration, ensuring my foundation stays flawless without peeling. It's complimentary from clarins

reviews.review_title: Serum with the goodness of Turmeric
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the key benefits of this serum is how it tackles multiple concerns at once: fine lines appear diminished, pores seem less noticeable, and my skin feels firmer and more elastic. The inclusion of potent plant extracts like turmeric, known for its anti-aging properties, adds to the serum’s effectiveness. Plus, it’s suitable for all skin types, which is a major plus.  Overall, Clarins Double Serum 9 is a game-changer for anyone looking to elevate their skincare routine. It’s a worthwhile investment, and the results speak for themselves. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_text: Love this it works great !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_title: Has become a part of my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this every morning and every night now. It's made my skin soft, glowy, and lifted. I love combining this product with the Cryo-Flash Instant Lift Mask, it adds more lift and glow.  The smell is a bit much, but fades away quickly. My skin (which is always sensitive) has only improved in making my pores nice and small, with no breakouts, my skin is less dull, and my skin (normally a desert) has regained its moisture.  Price-wise, expensive, but it is worth buying. The product has lasted me for over two months and it isn't even halfway through. I like the function of being able to choose a smaller pump amount, which helps make the product last longer.  The only flaw I find is the pump itself. When it squirts out the product, it can go flying in all directions, even with a hand underneath. It's so forceful like it's trying to extract a thicker product when the actual product is liquid. The pump needs to be a bit smoother for a liquid product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

I love the double serum light!! I’ve tried the regular double serum and honestly felt it was too much so the DSL is the perfect alternative! I would repurchase and recommend to anyone getting into nighttime skincare

reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful serum. I instantly notice an overall difference in how my skin looks and how hydrated it feels. It helps with all the fine lines and the appearance of them. It gives you such a beautiful glow.

reviews.review_title: Works well even for my dry skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry maturing skin so often aim for very rich skincare products, especially during winter.  However, the double serum light has been a great addition to my routine and I know I will use it year round!  For winter I layer it with other hydrating products and it gives such a boost to my skin texture and appearance.  I would imagine during summer I could get away with the double serum light over vitamin c serum and under a hydrating spf and that would be plenty for me.  The only complaint I have is the packaging.  The pump causes the serum to spray out too fast/hard which causes it to splatter every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins best selling, award winning serum niw has a lighter texture version. This is perfect for yhosevwiyh oily skin or if you live in a warm, humid climate. You still get all the gamechanging benefits of the Original serum except with a lighter texture. It still has the same 21 potent plant extracts and two-phased formula delivering water soluble and oil soluble ingredients. My skin looks this light texture as well as the benefits of a smoother, softer, radiant, more youthful complexion. This serum is definitely a skincare essential.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First time using it and it's wow! It feels great on skin, I love applying two layers of this serum yet it feels so lightweight, doesn't feel tacky and greasy.. And this serum absorbs quickly, makes my skin hydrated, softer, smoother and bouncy.. I have a dry skin and I'm  loving it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried the normal version of the serum and was very intrigued with the light texture version of this. It smells nice, like cotton scented soap. Its a little sticky after you put it on but only for a short while; it absorbs quite quickly. This would be a great addition for warmer weather as it feels really lighter than the original with the same ingredients, so far my skin is liking it.  The pump could use some improving but formula-wise my skin enjoys this.

reviews.review_title: Great serum, packaging could be improved
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is an interesting consistency. It almost feels like a water oil hybrid. It’s very light but still has a slight oil feel but it sinks into the skin quickly and doesn’t leave a greasy residue. It’s very hydrating for how light it is. My skin was starting to get dry with the colder weather and this has made it a lot softer. It does seem to give my skin some radiance and smooths it but I haven’t been using it long enough to really speak on long term benefits. The smell is ok, it’s not my favorite but it’s not unpleasant. My only complaint with this product is the packaging. For $130 serum I feel the packaging should be glass instead of plastic. The pump is not very good either, it’s not smooth and can squirt out too much. The product itself is a great serum I just feel the packaging should better match the price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been a big fan of this serum for quite some time now. It has such a nice texture and it smells good. The serum absorbs fairly fast and makes my skin soft, supple and moisturized. With a consistent use I’ve noticed that my skin looks brighter and feels firmer and the glow is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is my favorite. I love using it especially in the cold, as that's when my skin needs extra hydration, and this serum helps me a lot in hydrating my skin in winter. my skin is combination. I also like to use it in other seasons, but in the evening routine and in winter I use it both in the morning and at night. My skin is so hydrated and has a beautiful glow. I love so much. the packaging is also perfect. I can live without this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have being using this serum for a week and I see a little diference on my skin already. My skin is soft and bright in the mornings. I can’t wait to see the results and I finish the bottle. I received this product for free I’m exchange my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I already loved the original Double Serum & the light texture Double Serum is just as amazing! Love how radiant & healthy my skin looks since using. If you have combination/oily skin then this is perfect for you! This truly is a miracle serum in a bottle! So excited Clarins came out with a light version of the Double Serum!

reviews.review_title: Now you can double up on double serum
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a longtime user of the original Clarins double serum, and the double serum eye. I love both of those products and for my middle-age skin that tends to be on the dry side, they are a perfect balance between oil and water. However, I tend to avoid them during the summer months when I sweat a lot. This is the perfect solution. It’s definitely more lightweight than the original, double serum, and thinner. For me this means I need two full pumps of it to cover my face and neck well, but someone with less dry skin would need less. It sinks in really quickly and doesn’t leave any residue for me, but it does leave a slight suppleness to the skin and what feels like a thin protective layer, over which make up applies very smoothly and evenly. I don’t like the smell as much as I do of the original double serum. Currently I use this in the morning and the original double serum at night and my skin has never looked better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been trying this product for a couple of weeks and I love it! I love that it’s a lightweight formula that hydrates my face instantly! It has a fresh scent to it as well. I would definitely recommend this product to others to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Clarins serum really does the job. My face has been glowing and i'm here for it. I'm giving glass skin a run for its money. This serum pairs well with my other products. It has a light scent but nothing overbearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the original Double Serum and was so excited they came out with a Light Texture version targeted towards combination skin! It’s just as good as the original and my skin reacts very well to it! Beautiful texture and absorbs nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Double Serum by Clarins is a must have for me. I absolutely love it! The Light version is perfect for oily and combination. With my dry skin, I love this version in my AM routine, during the summer, and/or when my skin is very hydrated.

reviews.review_title: Must have in my skincare routine!!

reviews.review_text: I have been using this Serum for about a week now and I absolutely love how it makes my skin feel! My skin feels so smooth plump and more firmer. I have noticed a slight difference in my fine lines and wrinkles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Living in a cold region, I need maximum moisture for my skin, and I must say this serum gets my approval. It's an excellent product for hydrating the face and neck, with key ingredients that support the anti-aging process.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had tried the original Double Serum a few years back, and whilst I like what it did for my skin, I found it overly oily, so when I found out there's a light version, I had to give it a go. This definitely does not have that oily feeling of the original, the texture is much more watery which I like. I remember the original being quite heavily scented. This one doesn't quite smell the same but I don't mind it. The effect seems to be just as good as the original though, which is the most important thing. So for me, not perfect but works better than the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

I am loving this so far and looking forward to longterm results.

I love the light texture version because it layers with my other skin care products nicely and provides me an instant glow and improves my texture over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum! It is so light weight but so powerful! It melts into the skin so nicely without being sticky on the skin, and layers incredibly well with moisturizer and other skincare products! I love the packaging too, it is so nice and feels so luxurious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, and this product is perfect for that! It penetrates in my skin without leaving it oily. This is also a perfect base for your makeup.! It’s important for the skin to be hydrated with makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the Double Serum Light by Clarins. It comes in a beautiful bottle and the product color is a deep orange. The texture is light and doesn’t feel too oily. The two concentrates (oil and water based) come together in a single pump once dispensed. My skin felt really soft and smooth and it was well hydrated. It contains turmeric which is super beneficial for the skin. I loved using it and it looks great on my vanity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is the perfect addition to my night time routine. I love the spray applicator that automatically mixes the two phases of the serum so that t is perfectly apportioned. The serum soaks in so easily and  wake up with hydrated skin. It definitely feels smooth, too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula of this serum is incredibly lightweight it almost feels like a soft oil once absorbed into the skin. Not to be confused with oily but moisturizing. It also has a light floral like scent that I don’t seem to mind and I hate scented skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum! It’s so lightweight and feels amazing on the skin. It doesn’t feel heavy under makeup and I have experience zero irritation while using this product. It makes my skin feel so soft and look so glowy. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin

My skin absorbs the serum super quickly and it dries right away so I don’t have to wait to apply my make up in the mornings when I’m in a rush. I like products with skin loving ingredients and this serum delivers!

reviews.review_title: a must have for my morning routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this serum before and it has transformed my skin. helped with brightness, glow, texture, and hyperpigmentation. I love that this has a lighter consistency which is perfect for my skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is luxury at is finest!! My skin feels extremely hydrated, soft and with a beautiful glow after each use. It is pricey but it is like a luxurious glass of water for the skin, that also smells divine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum in the original so much and super excited for the light! It’s the perfect cocktail for my fine lines and dry skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

This one was super lightweight which made it honestly amazing to put underneath my Make up after letting this moisturizer settle into my skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, where has this been all my life? This does what I heard it does and more. It instantly makes my skin glowy and smooth. I also like how light this is and how well it works for my oily/combination skin. I experienced no irritation when I use this with my retinol product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: this serum feels so nice on the skin! this serum is definitely smoothening and makes my skin feel brighter.  I definitely cannot wait to see how my skin looks long term! definitely a must try for those with anti aging concerns!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this serum from Clarins and it’s been a game changer for my beauty routine. It makes my skin look so bright and young looking. I feel so refreshed! I would highly recommend this product to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I like how quickly it absorbs, it's practically weightless, leaving behind no sticky residue. It is a great consistency for my combination skin. I have tried the original version as well and prefer this light version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Feels so nice on the skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this serum and it definitely didn't disappoint! I am loving it! It leaves my skin hydrated and feeling soft and smooth. It looks brighter and overall healthier since I've started using it! Definitely one of my top favorites!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how Clarins came out with a lighter version of their popular double serum! This serum has became my must have. It made my skin firmer, smoother, and more radiant. I understand the hype and is definitely worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing serum. I use at night and have very sensitive skin, I like this light version because it’s not as heavy and does not irritate my skin at all while still giving me great firming results. I use it every night!

reviews.review_title: Ok luxury serum but has fragrance!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture and I am very impressed with the results. The serum has a light texture which makes it easy to apply and it absorbs quickly into the skin. It is also non-greasy and doesn’t leave a residue on the face. Since incorporating this serum into my routine, I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture and tone of my complexion. My skin looks and feels much more hydrated, brighter, smoother, and more radiant than ever before.  This serum works well with my other skincare products and I've noticed that my foundation glides on effortlessly after using this serum, creating a flawless and long-lasting finish.  If you're looking for a lightweight serum that doesn’t feel greasy and delivers exceptional results then this is the one for you. I can confidently say that the Clarins Double Light Serum has exceeded my expectations, I recommend you try it, you wont regret it!  #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

I would wake up with glowy skin and it seemed to smooth the look of mild marionette lines. I think this product is good if you need a light skin boost. The serum is lightweight and absorbed easily. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try from topbox circle #freeproduct. I really enjoyed the product especially when layering it under makeup. It helped create a soft and hydrated base that lasted full day. I liked that it never piled when adding moisturizer on top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using Clarins Double Serum Light Texture for a short time and I must say it’s become a staple in my skincare routine. The lightweight formula feels great on my skin, and I’ve noticed a significant improvement in its texture and overall radiance. It absorbs quickly and doesn’t leave a greasy residue. Plus, the dual-chamber packaging keeps the active ingredients fresh. Highly recommend for anyone looking to boost their skin’s vitality! #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: I'm looking forward to the results after a month!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am big into skincare, and I really enjoy trying new products to see what works best for me. I was super excited to try a Clarins product for the first time. I applied the serum at night after cleansing without additional products to avoid any reaction. Once the serum was in my palm, I was surprised at the consistency. But in a good way! I expected a heavy oil, not sure why when the name of the product contains the words light texture. It looked like watery oil if oil could be watered down :) I also noticed the serum's scent right away. I found it quite light and pleasant. If you are sensitive to scents though, you will notice it. It wasn't overwhelming and flowery but more like a feminine clean, woodsy scent. The serum was light on my skin, and it was quickly absorbed in just a few minutes leaving my face feeling slightly dewy but not tacky or sticky. The next morning, I woke up with skin that looked lovely and not like an oil slick! I only had to splash my face with water and for the rest of the day, my skin felt and looked super nice. I continued doing my simplified skincare routine of only using a gentle face wash in the evening followed by the serum and sunscreen if needed. By the end of the week, I hadn't experienced any irritation, redness, or breakouts. I enjoyed the way the serum felt on my skin, and I felt that my face did have a little glow when it was applied. Although that could have been from the turmeric. Haha! Overall, I hadn't noticed any significant change in my skin, but it wasn't in bad shape and given that the skin turnover rate is every 4-6 weeks that would be the ideal amount of time to see if there was a subtle improvement. *I'm not a dermatologist though so don't that as a scientific fact :) I will purchase this serum because I loved the feel of it on my skin, my skin looked healthy and hydrated/ I'm happy I had the opportunity to try the serum as a #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox so that I could pass on my honest (and lengthy) review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct I received a 7 day sample to review. I feel like 7 days is not enough time to get a real idea of the product. However, it felt nice on my skin, not heavy or oily. Skin looked good. No breakouts or anything. I also use one of the Clarins night creams, they worked well together. I may try a full size of the product as I was impressed with what I saw in the 7 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Clarins Double Serum as a #freeproduct through the #TryWithTopBox program and have been using it consistently for about a week now. The serum promises a smoother, more radiant appearance while having the benefit of being a lightweight product. By the end of the week, I agree that my skin looked radiant after application but it didn’t feel smoother. I have combination skin, which this serum is marketed towards, but the product felt heavy and my skin felt clogged after almost every use. I believe this serum would work great for those who have drier skin, especially during the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct I received some samples of this product in exchange for my review. Since I have combination skin, I am usually not a fan of any facial oil as it can cause acne and pimples on my face. However I found the normal Clarins double serum quite effective and not that oily. This new light double serum has completely removed my concern of its texture and becomes my must-have serum. I usually apply it during night time so that it can help my skin recover. It does a good job keeping my skin hydrated and firmed overnight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It was easy to mix and apply over my skin. My skin felt very hydrated from the first moment and very soft too. I'm happy because my skin feels hydrated all day, even after washing my face, It doesn't feel greasy and I really love the smell. It is a product that I will definitely add to my daily skin care. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Topbox Circle sent this to me as a #freeproduct to try! As per the name, this serum was very lightweight on the skin. It doesn't have a strong scent and it applies on the skin very nicely. I used this in my night routine and would consider purchasing this in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this #freeproduct from top box to try out.  I used it  primarily in the evenings after washing my face (before bed). It went on nicely amd wasn't sticky or have much of a smell. Easy to apply. I woke up the first morning and noticed results right away. My skin looked fresh plump and calm (I get a lot of redness in my face). I was happy with it. After using it for the 7 days, I noticed similar results but mid way through the 7 days I started to get some breakouts around my chin, cheeks and forehead. I would like to try the product longer than 7 days as it's not long enough to really tell if it's a good fit for me. Overall, I was fairly happy with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received Clarins Double Serum light #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox. I have always been a sucker for products that use natural ingredients, the more the merrier! This light formula combines 21 powerful plant extracts. However, it also contains perfume/fragrance which is not natural and I personally would prefer they do without, but the scent is really mild and went away when applied. The product claims to boost the 5 vital functions of the skin - regeneration, nutrition, oxygenation, hydration, protection - and acts on signs of aging.   I tried this serum for 7 straight days, both day and night as the sample provided. Within the first application I could already see my skin looked smoother. After the full 7 days I noticed my skin looked more luminous and felt firmer. As for smoothing wrinkles, I think I would probably have to use the product much longer to see a result. Overall, my skin looked more youthful looking.

reviews.review_title: The new part of my skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received samples of this product for free from Topbox Circle to try in exchange of my honest review.  I do really like this product because of the effectiveness of it and the feeling it leave on my skin after using it . I am using it about 1month ago and my skin texture  have changed. It feel smoother and soothing. The smell is great too. I really love it!  #trywithtopbox #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a #freesample from #topboxcircle and it was a refreshing product. It's a great product to put on before bed and leaves a refreshing feeling to your skin and it's overly scented. It is sticky though and can leave your face feeling sticky if you don't rub it in enough. It deffiently has a light feel to it, just rub it in fully. Overall pleasantly satisfying.

This serum is really light and good for my skin and I would recommend it to people if they ever ask, this product is really top-tier and amazing on the skin and I would for sure get it again. The smell is also very nice and refreshing and it glides smooth on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this serum for 7 days and I would say result is ok in average #freeproduct. I reallt enjoy texture of this product since it is light and easy. I would say I see some improvement, but it is not so obvious. It is nice texture and feel light on skin. It is really easy to apply and feel comfortable, I usually do this through my evening routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Double Serum Light Texture for free from Topbox Circle in exchange for my honest review. This is by far my favourite serum! It has a wonderful light scent and was so easy to apply, I started noticing results almost instantly! It made my skin feel super hydrated and plump and was super light weight. I highly recommend #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got clarins Double Serum Light Texture samples from Topbox Circle and Clarins in exchange for my honest review. Clarins Double Serum Light Texture is super light weight. Having combination skin, this serum absorbs pretty quickly leaving skin smooth.  It doesn’t feel greasy. I really enjoyed using this serum

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: good serum but its so costly I don't think its worth to buy. thank you topbox giving me opportunity to try this serum

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct to try and have been rather impressed with the little samples that I got! My pores seem smaller, my skin seems more hydrated and bright/glowy - even after using the serum for a few days. The texture is light and it does have a light scent, but not overpowering. Considering the short amount of time that I have been using this, I would definitely try buying a regular sized bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ✨Clarins Double Serum Light Texture✨  Thank you to Topbox and Clarins for sending me this #freeproduct in exchange for my honest review.  🔹21 plant extracts for protection, nutrition, hydration and more 🔹Dual serums to be mixed together on application 🔹Very light fragrance 🔹Light texture, especially compared to original 🔹Notable ingredients: leaf of life, goji, beautyberry, turmeric, glasswort  I’ve already had the opportunity to try the original version of this serum and it seems that the formula is almost identical, minus the texture (and perhaps the scent). This is very much a luxury serum with a matching price tag and while my review on the original version said the cost was a hard sell for me, this updated light version has earned a spot on my wishlist.  I noticed a small difference in smoothness and plumpness, even only using this for a week in the morning. The fragrance is a super faint floral, especially once the serum dries down. But my favourite part about this serum is definitely the texture.  I remember the original not necessarily feeling greasy but definitely heavier than I’d prefer for an AM routine. However, the light texture version works great in both routines. It feels oily when you first mix the two serums but as you rub it in, it melts beautifully and dries down without a hint of residue. I love the effect it gives my skin and how it leaves it impossibly smooth.  If anyone is looking to get me a Christmas present this year, please note that I am a size Double Serum Light Texture, thanks!  *Gifted, thank you @topbox @clarinscanada

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Double Serum Light Texture from Clarins #freeproduct and it is the best product I have ever tried! The texture is fluid and non-sticky and the smell is light and pleasant. I felt like I was applying a very luxury product. I felt my beauty hydrated, plumped and more radiant after the one-week trial. Although the price is high, I may well consider purchasing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was provided with a 7 day supply of this product to test free from TopBox Circle with no obligation for a positive review. Starting with the good - I liked the smell and it left my skin feeling good. I like the key ingredients. My skin felt better after application. Now to the negative, after the 7 days of use, I didn’t notice any remarkable differences overall, but would be interested in seeing any longer use impacts overall. The product targets Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dullness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity. I felt like this product made my skin more firm and elastic. I don't think it helped with dullness. I would use this again the summer when it is hotter and my skin is more oily. However, I do think the formula could be refined and I would re-purchase if it was.
#freeproduct I love this. I have very sensitive skin and this didn't make me break out at all. My skin felt very smooth and there's not much of a scent. I really like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Clarins Double Serum Light Texture 7 days samples from Topbox Circle and Clarins in exchange for my honest review! Clarins Double Serum Light Texture has an unique dual formula in a light texture. I have combination skin and this serum absorbs pretty quickly leaving skin smooth and hydrated! It doesn’t feel greasy. I really enjoy using this serum and thinking to purchase full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used this serum each night after washing my face. I felt that the serum left my skin feeling fresh and moisturized. My skin was not dry and was not sticky. I think that my skin may have overall had a more positive glow to it. #tryitwithtopbox #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a #freeproduct from TopBox Circle in exchange for my honest review. The serum has a pleasant fruity smell and is easy to apply. The texture is light and does not feel sticky. I used it in the afternoon, and it made my skin feel fresh and hydrated.

reviews.review_title: I Swear My Face Became Less Puffy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins Double Serum does not disappoint. Its double hydrolipidic formula consists of 21 potent plant extracts that work with the natural functioning of your skin and boost the skin’s 5 vital functions: regeneration, nutrition, oxygenation, hydration, and protection. The serum comes in a really cool eco-designed bottle containing two separate vials. In one there is a non-greasy oil, the other a melting gel. I love how easy it is to get the perfect amount you need. Very easy to apply. It’s a little wet, but not greasy at all. I’m not sure if it’s just my imagination, but I swear that the draining step makes my face just a little bit less puffy. It didn’t absorb instantly, but it was perfect when I was done draining. My skin was very smooth and soft, and I'm pretty sure the lines under my eyes faded ever so slightly. Regardless, my face looked brighter and refreshed which makes me very happy. I am very thankful to have been given the opportunity to test this #freeproduct from TopBox Circle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am happy that i have try this #freeproduct. Its easy to use and apply in the morning and the eavening. Its very light on the skin and fit perfect. I love that the ingradient are natural. I recommande this product for sure. And you dont have to use a lot of product so it last long.

I received this #freeproduct from #topboxcircle in exchange for an honest review. The pack came with about 5 sachets of the serum with two components separated. Cracking the sample allowed you to dispense the two liquids so you can mix them. I really like this interactive component of the serum. After using the product for 5 days, I found my face was more hydrated and plump (I usually have very dry skin) than usual. As a result, my makeup went on much more smoothly than usual. I found that this product is great to use as a primer or base before makeup for a hydrating base.
I really enjoyed the feeling in this serum on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received #freeproduct Double Serum Light Texture for my honest review. It felt really nourishing on my skin. It felt soft and plump on application. It felt a little heavy so I only used it at night and never tried it under make up. There is a light fragrance to it but I didn’t mind it. By the end of the samples I think my skin was smoother and radiant.

reviews.review_title: Nice but could use some improvements
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was provided with a 7 day supply of this product to test free from TopBox Circle. I did enjoy that it had a mild and refreshing scent. Additionally, once fully absorbed, it left my skin feeling softer after application. Overall, it does have a light weight consistency. However, I found that it didn’t absorb in quite as quickly as I would have liked, and while waiting for it to soak in, it left an odd almost sticky residue. A small amount was able to be spread around for decent coverage. After the 7 days of use, I didn’t notice any remarkable differences overall, but would be interested in seeing any longer use impacts overall.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a #freeproduct in exchange for an honest review.  The scent is a bit strong, so for people that are sensitive to that, it may not be the best. It feels nice and light on my skin and so far, it seems to not have any bad effects on me. I would need to try it out a bit longer than 7 days to see any obvious results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Clarins Double Serum with light texture both day and night, I noticed that my skin became brighter and more moisturized. The serum seemed to provide a healthy glow to my complexion while keeping my skin well-hydrated. The light texture of this serum is a standout feature, making it suitable for those who prefer a non-greasy, lightweight feel. The light scent adds a pleasant touch without being overpowering. I would highly recommend the Clarins Double Serum with light texture to others, particularly those with dry skin looking to address wrinkles and achieve a radiant glow. Its unique combination of ingredients and lightweight texture make it a standout product in the serum category. Overall, the serum was able to deliver even though I have used this product in short time and got it as #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wasn’t good wasn’t bad, I got this as a #freeproduct. I don’t think I would purchase this and there are other options I would get for the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins Double Serum Light Texture impresses with its lightweight formula, addressing various skincare concerns. The dual-phase system combines water and oil-soluble ingredients for versatility. It enhances skin texture, tone, and radiance, making it a worthy investment, despite the higher price point, and aligns with clean beauty standards. Ideal for daytime use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this as a seven day sample through the Topbox Circle program. While I didn't see a huge difference, I do see how it could be amazing over sustained long term usage. My skin feels very supple. The texture is light and absorbs super easily. The scent is strong, but one that I quite liked. Makes me feel very refreshed right after my cleanser toner routine. I would recommend trying this one on, if you have moderately dry skin like mine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox in exchange for my honest review. I received 7 days worth of the serum. It is indeed lightweight and has an oily texture to one side which works great in combination with the hydration side. I was worried my combination sensitive skin would feel oily as well as break out in a rash due to the fragrance but, it’s very lightweight and absorbs into your skin nicely! It was just a short trial but I did find my skin to look more even toned and hydrated, no complaints! A great lightweight serum I would recommend to someone whose skin is just starting to age. I feel this formula is great for all skin types. The only reason I gave this serum 4 star was due to fragrance, which does not linger or cause any skin irritation. Thank you Clarins & Topbox for the opportunity to test this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a #freeproduct, 7 day sample. I added it to my mourning routine. The serum is really lightweight, it didn't interfere with the other products on my routine. The skin feels smooth to the touch and I liked the scent, it didn't bother me. I would have to use it longer to see a huge visible difference, but so far I liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Clarins Double Serum with light texture, I noticed that my skin became brighter and more moisturized. The serum seemed to provide a healthy glow to my complexion while keeping my skin well-hydrated. The light texture of this serum is a standout feature, making it suitable for those who prefer a non-greasy, lightweight feel. The light scent adds a pleasant touch without being overpowering. I would highly recommend the Clarins Double Serum with light texture to others, particularly those with dry skin looking to address wrinkles and achieve a radiant glow. Its unique combination of ingredients and lightweight texture make it a standout product in the serum category. Overall, the serum was able to deliver even though I have used this product in short time and got it as #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: Not bad, not the best, average I guess!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this #freeproduct in exchange for an honest review from #topbox.  I gave this product an honest go for over a week to see how it turned out.  I have combination skin, so I have to be careful of the products I use. This serum went on nice and light and a little product went a long way. It dried quickly and didn't leave my face feeling greasy, which was good.  I found it was fairly average for moisture - it wasn't the worst product I have tried but it wasn't the best either. It wasn't enough to cause me to switch products from what I already use. Maybe it would be more effective on people with normal skin types instead. Overall, it was a decent product but pretty average, for me. Maybe longer use would give better results though, as I only received a sample which was enough for one week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am very lucky to try these #freeproduct from topbox and i would say it's amazing.It has a very strong smell at first but it did not stop me from using it.It’s has a combination of oil and water serum which is a dual power to minimize my pores upon using it.I trued using it on days before putting make up and its good as base primer, lightweight and you can’t even tell that you applied it.It’s very gentle on skin considering i have a very sensitive one.And when i applied it on nights my skin feels supple and hydrated when i wake up in the morning.I can tell the difference.Definitely worth a try and recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct got this free to try from topbox super excited to try this. the scent was very strong a bit much for me. however did try the serum under my makeup didn't notice much of a change at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is great for combination and dry skin. It is nourishing and moisturizing, but it doesn't feel heavy at all. And it works nicely as the makeup base. I'm so happy with the results and I think this serum will be a new staple in my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox. It was alright but I certainly wouldn't pay the price they're asking for it as I wasn't super impressed and it's crazy expensive. Didn't notice any signigicant changes in my skin. Scent was alright, little overpowering. It came in sachets which was kind of annoying and mesys to deal with. It was okay but there are definitely cheaper better products out there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have started using serums from last year and specifically monitor the effect. This serum is one the high quality serum I have come across. I used it after bath and before applying my moisturizer. If glides smoothly and your skin immediately feels soft. I started noticing my skin glowing after few applications. I am sure the regular use will prove effective with fine lines.. I recommend this product. Also, I didn't feel any irritation or dryness on the skin.  #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this to try #freeproduct from TopBox and the review is in my own words. I used the serum over a few days, didn’t really notice a difference but that could be because I didn’t use it long enough. The scent was a bit too strong for my liking. I could see with more use that my skin would change. The only thing  I noticed is that my skin felt smoother and hydrated all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved a 7 day supply from Toolbox in exchange for my honest review. This product goes onto the skin nicely. It doesn't feel sticky or tacky. It left my skin feeling nice and soft, but 7 days is not long enough to see real results. My only dislike is it is heavily scented. It's not an unpleasant scent but it is heavy for something you are putting on your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Double Serum Light Texture as a #freeproduct for my honest opinion. The serum was very lightweight on my skin and the scent is lovely and soft. The serum left my skin soft and hydrated. I would recommend this product but the cost would keep me from purchasing it myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is wonderful as a base under makeup . It leaves the skin radiant and smooth to the touch. What I really enjoyed was that it didn't leave my skin greasy it made my skin look hydrated and healthy ! Its a fun product to use because of the the two types of serum that blend together leaving your skin feeling perfectly balanced.#freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have received this product for free in exchange of my honest review from topbox circle. I have used this product couple of times and i did like this product. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7-day sample of the double serum from Topbox Circle for free in exchange for my honest review.  I used it night time. I love the light texture. I have oily skin. But after I apply it, I don't feel slimy.  It does have a nice scent. But as a non-scent lover. The smell is a bit too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Clarins Double Serum Light Texture completely revolutionized how I apply skincare during the day. The effective combination of ingredients in this serum is amazing, and it has left my skin looking much smoother and more luminous. Even better is its non-greasy, light texture, which absorbs like a dream. The mild aroma is a lovely addition. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for a review #freeproduct #trywithtopbox I used it at night, one sample sachet for my face and neck warmed up between my palms before applying. It has a light texture and the smell reminds me of garnier shampoo. If you smell it deeply there is a slight plastic undertone but mostly the floral fruity scent masks it. I prefer no added scents in my products but I like that this has squalane and glycerin. Need more time to see positive or negative effects

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this double serum of Clarins from Topbox circle. I thought it would be a full sized sample to have me review but it was only for a week. It was in great packaging and cool too! I loved the smell and I use it everyday at night. It was very hydrating and light. I didn't feel any stickiness at all. I didn't see any type of difference on my skin since only used it for a week. I will need to further use the product to see noticeable changes. Overall, would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from topbox. After using it for the past couple weeks I’ve noticed great improvement in the skin around my face. Not only is my face nicely hydrated but the glow is absolutely stunning. Every time I use Clarins double serum the change is noticeable I get many compliments on my healthy skin. The investment is worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for my honest review. The package has 7 sample serums inside. Very easy to use, just snap in the middle and the serum comes out. I love the tea tree scented smell very calming. The serum was very light on the skin. I did noticed my skin was very smooth the next morning and firm. I do consider purchasing this product in the future. freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this serum. It feels so rejuvenating on my face and give it such a lovely glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7 day supply #freeproduct. I didn't find enough product for morning and night so I only applied in the evening. I found the scent to be overpowering at first but got used to it as days went by. It made my skin feel smoother but felt 7 days wasn't long enough for a proper review.

I received a 7 day sample of the Double Serum Light Texture as #freeproduct from #Topbox. I used it at night time before I went to sleep for a week and it truly feels very light on the skin. The serum smells amazing and feels so soft on my skin. I would recommend this product. Thank you Topbox.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am neither satisfied or dissatisfied with this product. My #freeproduct from #topbox was on par with similar products of half the cost. I liked it, but not enough to run out and buy it instead of a less expensive equal product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free to review in exchange for my honest opinion. I found this serum very hydrating, it was easy on the skin and not irritating. There was a slight scent that was not too bothersome. we only tried a sample pack so I would need to use it longer to check for effects. #tryitwithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this #freeproduct and what a glorious scent, unique packaging, clear instructions and total luxury with a lightweight and well hydrating serum…perfection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a week’s worth of this serum via topbox as a #freeproduct. I found that the sachets did not have a sufficient amount of product in them and it was a messy process, having to snap the  package in half and then squeeze the serum out with my fingers. I did not notice any significant changes or improvements to my oily/combination skin. However, it did not break me out or irritate my skin. I would classify it as a decent serum.

reviews.review_title: Love the light weight feel on my skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Clarins Double Serum Light Texture is a dual-phase formula. When applying it during the day, it feels lightweight and non-greasy on the skin. The scent is subtle and pleasant, making it suitable for daytime use. I love that it’s hydrating and has brightening effects, which make it a great addition to my morning skincare routine. For nighttime use, the lightweight texture doesn't feel heavy on the skin. The serum's hydrating properties help keep the skin moisturized overnight, and improves in the overall texture and radiance. I received this as #freeproduct for my honest opinion, thanks TopBox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product with #topbox #freeproduct. I was lucky enough to use it for 7 consecutive days. I decided to use the product after my evening facial cleaning routine. The texture is initially oily, but quickly penetrates my face. Even before the end of my 7-day trial, I noticed that my skin was better hydrated. This serum will definitely be part of my routine in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am lucky to have received the clarins Double Serum Light Texture product from Topbox #freeproduct. I admit I was hesitant at first, but after my 7day trial was over, I was very disappointed that it was all gone. I loved this product . It had a strong floral and perfume like scent that was very pleasant. Although the scent was very strong, it did not irritate my face. The product is light, but left my face very moisturized. I chose to put it on every morning and the moisture lasted all day. By the last couple days of my product testing, I felt like the skin on my face was much more soft, and I did notice it looked more plump. I would recommend this product as long as you don’t mind a strong scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried out this serum for several days and focused mainly at applying it at night before moisturizer. This is a lightweight texture with a faint scent and has a nice consistency. I applied this on my entire face & neck and noticed there was a slight tackiness to my skin but it did go away after a few minutes. My skin felt soft & hydrated. I can't really say if it did anything for the fine lines, but I'm hoping with continued use, they will gradually be less noticeable. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7 day sample from #tryitwithtopbox for my honest review.  I tried the serum for 7 days straight in the evening by warming up the serum in my palms for a few seconds.  I gently distributed it on my face, pressing in places that needed extra attention.  I noticed that the serum didn’t sit on my face as it instantly absorbed into my skin.  The next morning, I noticed a marked improvement in my skin tone and slightly brighter complexion.  Over the course of 7 days, I continued to notice a subtle difference versus day 0.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Clarins Double Serum Light texture as a #freeproduct. The first thing that got my attention was its natural fragrance, and the product was very hydrating to my skin. I received the sample for only seven days and cannot accurately tell the overall result. However, I do believe that with extended use, this product has the potential to work wonders for all skin types. It's definitely worth considering for those seeking a hydrating and revitalizing skincare solution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

My skin feels very well hydrated but I do find it takes a bit of time to fully absorb so I used it before bed and wouldn’t recommend using it under makeup. I also love the beautifully subtle scent which doesn’t overwhelm or irritate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this #freeproduct to try. I really enjoy using this serum. I use it at bedtime as part of my night time routine. My skin loves it. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I am so happy I was able to receive this #freeproduct. I love the floral scent, which is perfect and not overpowering. I also like how light the formula is for my oily-combination skin. Once applied it doesn’t feel heavy on my skin. Thick products tend to clash with my oily skin type and visible pores, so this is perfect. After using this product my face looked more radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Double Serum Light Texture from #tryitwithtopbox as a #freeproduct to review!   I received a weeks worth of sample packs, which was amazing.   The texture is beautiful and rich, very silky and goes on so smooth.   There is a slight scent, but this does dissipate after a few minutes.   I love the luminous look my skin has with this serum and I have not noticed any real visible change in my fine lines, but my skin does look brighter and more clear.  I used this day and night and I would like to continue using this to see the difference it would make.   I have combination skin, I had no reaction to this serum - very soothing on my face.   Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

I enjoyed the light scent and was pleased that the product was not oily or greasy feeling on my skin. I enjoyed using Clairin's Double Serum Light Texture!

Un produit merveilleux que je vais ajouter à ma routine quotidienne. J ai remarqué une différence immédiatement sur ma peau, ma peau semble plus saine après seulement quelques utilisations. #freeproduct #topboxcircle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this serum as a #freeproduct to try and, I must say, I was very pleased.  I used it daily at night after removing my makeup as part of my care routine. It was recommended that the serum be warmed before applying, which I did so in my hands. I immediately noticed the very pleasant and light scent, not overpowering at all.  I applied to my face and neck. I began seeing results almost immediately.  There was a noticeable difference in the feel of my skin and complexion.  The pores on my nose and chin seemed to decrease in size and I had more of a, dare I say, youthful glow to my skin.  Although the price tag is a bit more than I am used to, I would have to say I would definitely continue to use this serum... the results are worth the extra expense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a 7-day sample of the double serum from Topbox Circle. The serum has a light flowery scent and is like water in terms of texture.  I rubbed it between my hands and pressed it into my skin as per instruction on the Clarins website and the serum absorbed fairly quickly. I have combination skin and did not find the serum too oily. I think the key to good results is pressing it into your skin and not spreading it on your face.  As for results, my skin looked hydrated and my pores looked smaller.  Bonus, it helped with eczema I had on the palm of my hand.  It’s pricey but if you can afford it, I recommend this serum. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture from Topbox in exchange for my honest review. I think is a great light serum. It is easy to apply and and absorbs well into the skin. The texture and smell at nice too

reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample. I wasn't expecting much since I would need to use this product for at least a month to see results but I was wrong! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture from Topbox in exchange for my honest review. The sample came in a packet with two different serums where you open them to dispense them both in your hand to mix together. I found it is best to warm up the serum in your hand before applying but when you do apply it, it is very oily. I found it took a while for the serum to absorb into my skin if I didn't warm up the product. I also think it would be better for dry skin types because I have combination skin and sometimes it'll be oil and the product would be too oily on me. Lastly, there was a very strong sent from the product that I didn't like. Beware if you are sensitive to scents and if you have oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a #freesample of the Double Serum Light Texture. I used this serum as a part of my night time routine. It was a great on my skin! I used this serum for roughly around a month and could see a positive difference in my skin, I really enjoyed this product and will be purchasing in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins Double Serum Light✨  🧡 It is more like a water based serum. Easily absorbed into skin and it’s in the colour of honey   🧡 It has 21 plant extracts which helps in skin’s regeneration, nutrition, oxygenation, hydration, and protection  🧡 It has a unique double texture formula which has a non greasy oil and a melting gel combination  🧡 It has a refreshing floral fragrance which is not too strong   🧡 Claims to reduce the appearance of wrinkles  🧡 Helps in reducing the appearance of pores and gives an even skin tone  🧡 One of the best serums for anti-aging   🧡 I use it in the nights after cleansing and toning   🧡 For me, it has definitely helped in improving skin texture and toned the skin well.  It is on the expensive side but worth the use if you want a youthful skin. And it comes in a huge bottle which could come a long way.   #freeproduct #gotitfree #forreviewpurpose

It goes well under ma­keup. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received free product samples from Topbox Circle in exchange for my honest review. #freeproduct  I’m in my early 50’s and have combination/oily skin that can be prone to breakouts. Ive been using several Clarins products regularly over of the years with success and it’s one of my favourite brands. There is always some hesitation on my part when trying new products because of my skin being prone to breakouts. Happily, I can report that after using this serum at night for several weeks, I did not breakout and in fact my skin looks and feels healthier. It has evened out my skin tone, eliminating redness and even noticeably reducing pore size. It has a nice, light consistency that is not too thin or too thick, making for easy application.  Absorption is quick and it instantly soothes, feeling great on the skin. I enjoy the fragrance which is light and not at all overpowering. Sometimes a fragrance can trigger my allergies but not so with this serum. My only issue was that when applied at night before bedtime, after cleansing, I would wake up and notice a bit of a sheen to my face, but no irritation or breakouts and no oil control issues during the day. Cleansing removed any sheen. The overall results of Clarins Double Serum have been great and even at its full-size price point, and since a little goes a long way, I will purchase this serum and add it to my daily routine.

reviews.review_title: My skin really likes this serum

I only wish that I had more product to try it out for longer. Overall I would say that my skin really likes this serum. reviews.review_text: Thank you @topboxcircle and @clarinscanada for gifting me with a free 7-day sample of Clarins’ Double Serum Light Texture. I used the serum every evening for a week and observed its effects on my skin. Compared to the Double Serum, I really appreciate how it uses a similar formula of 21 plant extracts and prioritizes natural ingredients, but improves it by giving it a lighter texture. The Light Texture serum was even easier to apply on my face and still made my skin look dewy. I did not experience any negative reactions to the product with my combination skin. However, the sample size was too small to notice any significant different in my face in terms of reducing wrinkles or effects of aging.

If you're looking for a serum that delivers on hydration and skin improvement, this one's a winner!

Perhaps if I was to used this product for longer than the 7 day sample I would also see a change in fine lines. I would say this product is a good product to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

I liked the product but not loved it, I am not sure if the sample package was not great to extract the product, quantities were uneven so I was not sure how exactly mixed the product, it has a little bit of smell but nothing that causes allergies (I have a sensitive skin) I am not sure if the experience using the bottle is different or not, I would had loved that they gave a small little bottle since I feel like every sample was wasting so much plastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Just as effective as the original
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: @clarinscanada recently released a ‘Light Texture’ version of their amazing original Double Serum formula. I received a 7-day sample sachet pouch, and after the week of use I noticed just as good of an effect as I did with their original serum. To be honest I did not notice much of a difference in the texture, really. The serum absorbs into the skin very well with only a very fine residue. The sachet is composed of two separate formulas, a non-greasy oil and a melting gel, from two different vials that you mix together. The scent is fragrant but not overpowering. I still have that ‘lit from within’ radiant glow. I apply it overnight while I sleep - my skin wakes up feeling very soft and smooth and my complexion looks brighter. My mum tried one as well, and she liked it just as much as the original. You really can’t go wrong with any variation of the Double Serum, it is one of the best products on the market. Definitely recommend. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct Tried the clarins double serum.  Loved the light fragrance.  I used the serum at bedtime.  It looks heavy but was easily absorbed into my skin without an oily feeling.  Didn’t notice my fine lines being reduced with the one week sample.  Would need to buy product to see if it actually works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 🌱 This is a two-in-one product with 21 youth-boosting plant extracts which targets wrinkles, firming, radiance, eveness, and pore reduction. Seriously, it’s the holy grail!   🧡The packets have two separate compartments that you mix together. You then apply the product onto your face. I love this concept as it helps to keep the ingredients more potent!  🍯 The two serums are thin in consistency. One has a rich gold colour and the other is clear. When mixed together, it almost looks like honey in your hands. The texture of the serum is a bit oily at first. But, it absorbs into the skin quickly and doesn’t leave you with a greasy feeling!  🌺I personally liked to apply this product in both my morning and evening routine. Its dual texture leaves an immediate barely there finish and a pleasant fragrance with fruity, floral, fresh and refined notes  that is not too overpowering. If you aren’t a big fan of the scent, don’t worry, it dissipates quickly.  ✨ I noticed immediate results with this serum. It's incredibly hydrating and left my skin with a nice glow. After only a few days of use, I have noticed a dramatic shrinkage in my larger pores and a much smoother skin texture. This stuff is seriously amazing. I am absolutely blown away and loving the results! ✨   ✅I have combination/acne prone skin and for me it didn't cause any break outs or irritation. I definitely recommend this product to everyone and will definitely be purchasing a full-sized bottle of this serum! #freeproduct #topboxcircle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample #Freeproduct from Topbox. I have used the original serum before and it clogged my pores and I broke out very bad. With this light serum, it worked very well with my acne prone skin. I use this serum at night only and wakes up with a glowing skin. Will definitely repurchase the full size.

The serum has a mild jasmine fragrance which isn't overpowering. The serum took about 5-8 minutes to completely absorb into my combination skin.

It seemed like the 2 products were not equal amounts, much more of one than the other. Scent was alright and it absorbed quickly. I would give this another try if available on sale.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: This product is amazing, you need this!

reviews.review_text: I received the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture as a #Freeproduct from Topbox. Clarins products in general just Work really well with my skin. reviews.review_title: Winner! Will become a regular in my routine
