reviews.review_text: Really enjoyed this product. The texture was very light with a pleasant fresh scent. I’ve noticed a refining of wrinkles and pores and am looking refreshed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7 day sample from Clarins in exchange for a review. To provide some context, I have a very good and extensive skincare routine, and any new products I introduce usually do not have drastic benefits and definitely won't have drastic benefits with only a few uses (7 day sample). As predicted, this serum did not do anything remarkable for my skin. However, it is a good basic serum that combines hydration (water) and moisture (oil), and will provide a lightweight glow to your face. As an aside, I prefer unscented skincare products and this one is scented. For the price, you can find other alternatives that have more powerful ingredients and are more cost effective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a 7 day sample from #trywithtopbox #freeproduct for a honest review.   The sample came as a card that snaps and the 2 products mix.  It seemed like the 2 products were not equal amounts, much more of one than the other.  Other than that and the breakouts it seemed to work well.  7 days is not enough time to see any dramatic results,  but short term, my skin was a little smoother and the texture improved slightly. The scent was nice, definitely a hint of turmeric.   Light texture, little tacky at first but seeps in nicely after a few seconds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I love that it's suitable for all skin types, including my somewhat sensitive skin, and it didn't cause any irritation. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Topbox in exchange for a review. The package included a 7-day trial with individual packets. When I used the first two, I noticed that I woke up the next day with little pustules on my chin and that my pores looked huge. Because of that, I took a break for about a week and a half and decided to try it again, and the same thing happened. I have oily skin, and there's something in this product that not only makes my pores look massive but also clogs my pores to cause breakouts/irritation. Because of that, I would recommend this product to anyone with acne-prone skin. I also found the fragrance to be a strong floral scent, which may be a problem for people with sensitive skin. I found that the serum absorbed into my skin well and didn't feel heavy at all. Because I couldn't use the product consecutively, and considering it was a 7-day trial, there's no way for me to determine whether or not it's effective with fine lines.  Overall, this product is a no-go for me. I don't want to swap fine lines with pimples.  #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this free to try from topboxcircle and clarins, in exchange for my honest review. I really enjoy the light weight feel that does the heavy lifting in my skin care routine. In just 7 days I noticed a glow to my skin, a reduction in the fine lines around my eyes and mouth. If this product is in your budget, it' s a great product. I'd it's not in your budget there are plenty of great alternatives on the market.

reviews.review_text: I tried Clarins Double Serum Light Texture through #TryItWithTopbox. I have dry-combination skin and after using it for a week these are my thoughts. I really enjoyed the light floral scent, and was a huge fan of the silky texture. The serum absorbed really well, with no sticky residue and no lingering film. My skin felt nice and smooth, and the product sat well under makeup, my skin looked dewy and plump. It's a price point that's a little out of my league, but I'd treat myself to it in the sale or with a coupon. If budget isn't a concern to you I'd say 100% go for it, this is a quality product with great ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this serum as a free Topbox sample, and I was surprised at how good this serum was! It felt really nice on the skin, and I didn't experience any sensitivity to using the product. I'd definitely recommend trying it if you're curious 🙂👍🏻

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually use the original serum and didn't think it could feel lighter. But it actually does and feels weightless.  The reason I keep using this is because it doesn't have a silicone feeling, and doesn't make me break out. It feels very natural with no offensive scent.  I use this after a prescription cream and I have no reaction. For the price point it is the best of the category. Sensitive skin approved. #freeproduct from topboxcircle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary for the purpose of review #freeproduct. It dispensed in a way that the two formulations mixed together coming out of the package and were mixed when applied on the skin. It had a light oil serum texture, not greasy and absorbed fairly well, as someone with oily skin I only used this at night time not during the day under makeup. I perceived that it helped with skin smoothing in terms of bumps and redness over the week I tested it, it did not cause any issues with acne. reviews.review_title: Great Addition to my skincare regimen

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had the privilege of incorporating the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture into my daily skincare routine, and I must say, it has truly impressed me.  #freeproduct I used this serum both in the morning and at night, and the results have been remarkable. First and foremost, the light texture of this serum is a winner. It feels incredibly silky and smooth on the skin, and it absorbs quickly without any residue. This made it an absolute joy to use, especially under makeup during the day.  The scent of the serum is delightful - it's subtle and adds a spa-like experience to my skincare routine. It's not overpowering, which I appreciate.  Now, let's talk about the results. Over time, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall health and appearance of my skin. My complexion looked more radiant and felt incredibly soft to the touch. Fine lines seemed to be less noticeable, and my skin felt hydrated throughout the day.  What sets this serum apart is its dual-phase formula, combining both water-soluble and oil-soluble ingredients. This comprehensive approach seems to address various skin concerns effectively. It's like giving your skin a dose of nourishment and hydration all in one.  Would I buy this product? Absolutely. While it may be on the higher end in terms of price, the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture is worth the investment for the visible results it delivers.  Would I recommend it to friends and family? Without a doubt. If you're looking for a serum that offers a luxurious experience while delivering fantastic results, this is the one. It suits a wide range of skin types and concerns, making it a versatile addition to any skincare routine. Clarins has truly nailed it with this product.

reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from #trywithtopbox in exchange for my honest review.    I have to say I love this Clarins Double Serum Light Texture very much, because I truly feel it gives me more than a double serum.  I especially love it contains hyaluronic acid which is fit me well on my dry skin.  I keep applied it twice daily so to give my skin some extra hydration during the day, besides of nourish my skin at night.    After a 7-day treatment of using this product, my skin is noticeable firmed, some fine wrinkles are almost disappearred and those deep wrinkles are visibly smoothed.  Radiance and evenness are restored to the complexion, and pores are diminished obviously.  I want to say it is such an amazing serum I never tried, as it is just 7 days my skin feels intensely nourished, smoother, firmer and noticeable brightening.  I have already purchased the full size of this serum, and I also highly recommended this product to all of my friends.

After a few days use I did see a noticeable difference in the firmness and radiance, but I did not see a lot of reduction in my pores. I found the scent to be pleasant and not overpowering. However, if you do not enjoy fragrance or are sensitive to fragrance this may not be for you. If you are looking for more even texture and to give your skins radiance a boost this serum is worth a try.

It's like a gossamer veil of hydration and comfort on my skin. There’s a slight yellow tint to it (thanks to the turmeric), so it might not be the best choice to wear under makeup, unless you like this effect. It’s subtly, almost undetectably scented and a little sticky when you first apply it, but it quickly melts into skin. My complexion is instantly glowy and plumped up. LOVE!

reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct sample for a 7 day period. I've used a few different brands of serums with mixed results. This one is different!!! I was unimpressed with the sample packaging and had to open it with scissors but once the serum was in my hands, everything changed. The clean, delicate scent is not overpowering nor does it linger. Gently warming the serum in my palms activated it and I patted my face and neck to apply. It soaked in quickly and did not leave a greasy 'film' as some do, and accepted my light moisturizer afterward with no weird mixing or flaking on my skin. There was no residue either and my skin genuinely enjoyed this product. My skin glowed and did not look oily or shiny (you know that shine I mean!) I wholeheartedly endorse this serum. Bonus is that the wee bit that was left over on my palms I put on the back of my hands and even they began to look firmer! Great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Clarins Double Serum is a true delight for the senses! From the moment you apply it, the beautiful fragrance envelopes you, creating a luxurious and spa-like experience. The scent is subtle yet captivating, leaving a delicate and refreshing aroma on the skin.  Not only does it smell amazing, but this serum also works wonders for the skin. Its lightweight texture glides on effortlessly, instantly quenching the skin's thirst and providing a boost of hydration. The powerful blend of ingredients deeply nourishes and revitalizes, leaving the skin feeling incredibly soft, smooth, and rejuvenated.  With continued use, I've noticed a remarkable difference in my skin's appearance. It looks more radiant, plump, and youthful, with a noticeable improvement in texture and tone. The Double Serum has become a staple in my skincare routine, and I can't imagine being without it.  If you're searching for a serum that not only smells divine but also delivers exceptional results, look no further than the Clarins Double Serum. It's a true treat for the senses and a game-changer for your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to try Clarins Double Serum Light Texture as a #freeproduct to review, and I am loving the results. Let me preface by saying that I had used Clarins original Double Serum last year. I had loved that the OG serum really hydrated my skin and left it looking dewy, but I only applied it at night as the serum was too oily for me. The Double Serum Light Texture solves that problem! After an application, my skin both looks and feels more hydrated. The Light Texture serum is easy to mix in your palm, goes on super smooth and soaks into my skin better than the OG serum. I liked that it left my skin looking fresh. I had a literal glow! I’m also happy that I’m able to apply the Light Texture serum both day and night, and have not had any issues with looking or feeling too oily. I absolutely love this serum and will continue to incorporate it into my daily routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a few samples of this Double Serum Light texture serum from Topbox to try in exchange for my review. I used the serum both morning and night. I applied it as recommended on the Clarins website by warming the product in my hands and pressing into my face, neck and decollate. I also used whatever product that remained on my hands into the top of my hands. I can't say I have seen a dramatic improvement in my face from using this product. I only received 7 small sample packets so not enough to determine what the long-term effects would be. However, I have noticed an improvement in my hands, which is great! Given the cost of the serum, I don't know if I would purchase but during a Sephora sale, I might buy it. #freeproduct

I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's overall texture and radiance since incorporating this serum into my daily routine. It seems to have a brightening effect, and my fine lines appear less noticeable. Plus, the fact that it's packed with natural plant extracts is a big win for me, as I prefer products with clean and effective ingredients. The Double Serum Light Texture has become a staple in my skincare regimen, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a lightweight yet potent anti-aging serum. It's a small investment that delivers impressive results for a more youthful and radiant complexion.

Clarins serums are well-regarded for their quality and effectiveness and this Double light serum was no different.  The serums come in elegant packaging and often incorporate natural ingredients, which aligns with the brand’s ethos of combining plant-based elements with advanced skincare science. This wonder ingredient was tumeric. Tumeric has many benefits for your skin.   Now, I was only provided a weeks worth of serum, so it’s hard to judge any long term effects but the short time benefits were very nice. My skin felt very moisturized and the skin tone was nice and even.   One of the strengths of Clarins serums is their ability to address various skincare issues, including hydration, anti-aging, brightening and much more    Clarins serums are often praised for their lightweight and easily absorbable textures, making them suitable for various skin types, including sensitive skin. I loved the Clarins Double Light Texture serum as it went on so smoothly and absorbed in seconds, leaving me with plenty of time for my other skin care in my rushed mornings.

reviews.review_text: I received a 7 day sample as a #freeproduct through #trywithtopbox. I really did not enjoy the scent, too strong and floral for me. The serum did absorb quickly and made my skin feel nice after use, but I did not notice much of a difference compared to other skincare I've used after only 7 days of use. Due to the scent and high price point with not enough results to notice after this short period of time I likely will not purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a #freeproduct from #topbox. I had 7 days worth of packets. While I loved the texture of it and the scent, I cannot say it made a difference on my skin maybe in the future I’ll buy it to get the full effect and to see if it really works

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this #freeproduct to try and I really enjoyed using it. The double serum is lightweight, has a pleasant scent, and feels fresh. The formula works on my sensitive skin, I haven't noticed any major difference but my skin does feel hydrated. Quick, easy, and good for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big fan of the original double serum but I love the light version even more. my skin looked radiant and felt super hydrated and silky immediately after applying it. the plant extracts make the serum smell so nice and luxurious. I got to try this as a #freeproduct and only noticed that my skin feels softer after my 7 day sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Clarins Double Serum Light Texture is a skincare game-changer. I used it day and night and loved its lightweight texture. It absorbed quickly, felt soothing, and the subtle scent was a plus. It visibly improved my skin's hydration and texture, making it a must-have in my routine. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product over one week and really like it. It’s definitely a light texture and is absorbed by the skin and perfect for warmer weather. The smell was light and just perfect. However if you have oily skin or acne prone skin this product is not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product states that after 7 days continuous use the at I would notice a difference. Unfortunately I do not at all. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample #freeproduct of Clarins' Double Serum Light Texture. The sample packets were fun to crack open into my hand and mix the serums. I enjoyed the scent quite a bit. The product made my skin feel hydrated and dewy. Not sure of any changes in my skin yet, but I'd be willing to commit to using this regularly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Clarins Double Serum 7 day treatment. I have noticed both a healthy glow and a reduction of my fine wrinkles.  The serum is very hydrating leaving my skin very smooth. I used it in the morning after cleansing and before my moisturizer. The light texture is an amazing feature. The smell is pleasant. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct I want to love this product because I think the packaging and thought of it is nice! I just don’t see much in the ingredients that would be helpful. I see tumeric and oat though!!!

reviews.review_title: Not as Good as the Orignal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given a 7-day supply for free from TopBox Circle in exchange for my honest review. I had tested the original formula before and really liked it, so I had high hopes for this one. However, this serum felt more oily and within a few hours my skin felt greasy. Halfway through the trial my skin felt like it was getting clogged. I finished the seven days and the only thing that this light serum has going for it is it worked decently with my other skincare products. I just wish it didn’t make my skin feel more greasy and clogged than when I started. #gotitfree

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture for a few weeks now, mostly as part of my nighttime skincare routine, and I'm loving the results! My skin feels noticeably firmer and smoother each morning. The lightweight texture makes it easy to apply, and it absorbs quickly, leaving no sticky residue. Plus, the subtle scent is pleasant and the application feels so luxurious. It's become a staple in my skincare routine, and I can't wait to see even more improvements over time. Highly recommended for anyone looking to up their anti-aging game!  #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a really nice serum. It goes on smooth and doesn’t leave a greasy residue. It absorbed fairly quickly and left skin feeling soft. Has a really nice soft scent as well, not overpowering at all. I can’t comment on long term effects due to size of sample but based on the week I would think this product works really well. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loved the results with this product after just one week of trying it! I recurved this product for free in exchange for my honest review. The smell, texture and the way it soaks into your skin is absolutely perfect. After using this product for just one week I found my skin felt and looked healthier. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who is thinking about trying it.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is very hydrating and a great base for makeup. It's also great for applying after using certain chemical treatments and before moisturizer (morning or evening). It smells nice but the scent is not overwhelming, leaves my skin feeling SO SMOOTH, and seems to improve texture over consistent use. It says it's for oily/combination skin but the serum is very liquidy itself due to the squalane and other oils in its formula so I feel like it would be great in winter and for dry skin too. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum from clarins is one of my favourite serums it has such light texture that is absorbed super fast leaving no cast behind, it’s also infused with 21 plant extracts that gives you a healthy glowy skin #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample for my honest review.  Even thought this is called a light texture I found it very thick feeling on my skin.  It absorbs nicely and leaved my skin feeling smooth.  I would need to try this product for longer to see if my wrinkles will start disappearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct from Topbox. I received Double Serum Light Texture for review, I must say its worth trying. Though it is for both morning and night use, but I used only in the morning and was good for me. This serum is light and suitable for normal skin types. I do love the fact that is has very light fragrance which is amazing. Recommended!!

reviews.review_title: My routine  would not be complete  without  it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using  this product. Made my skin feel  like I was yonge  again. Enjoyed  the feeling  of applying  the serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received some free samples of this in exchange for an honest review. I have oily/combo skin for reference. The serum has 2 separate parts that you mix together before applying. Although this is called  Light Texture, I do not think it has a light texture and found it to be a rich serum. It absorbs nicely, but does leave the skin with a bit of a sheen. I used it at night for this reason.  It made my skin feel very hydrated and soft in the morning. I would recommend it, but caution that the texture isn't light. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct sample that I was able to test out for several days. I normally find Clarins products too heavily scented and heavy feeling, however this serum was not. It was lightweight and had a light scent that did not sting my skin. I didn’t see any visible results, but I didn’t expect to after just a few days. However I wouldn’t recommend this product to a friend because I just don’t know enough about what’s in the product, whether there are visible results with before and after pictures, and I don’t know if it interacts with any of my other skincare ingredients. More information on the product website would help those heavily invested in their skincare routines in order to determine whether they can incorporate it as part of theirs.

reviews.review_title: My skin feels moistured and plump!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum goes on easy on my skin, you just need a small amount, doesn’t feel greasy and absorbs quickly. The scent is nice and light.   I have been using this serum at night and I have noticed a difference in my skin texture and discolouration a bit lighter. it has definitely kept my skin moistured, and plump. My face feels wonderful. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like to apply it at night before bed, when I wake up my skin feels wonderful and soft. It's very concentrated I find so a little goes a long way. Too much and it can feel a little oily. Would be nice on its own under makeup as a primer. In a week I've noticed a difference in my dehydration and wrinkles but would like to try it for a month to really see the results. Love the light scent! #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

I used it in the mornings after cleansing and before moisturizer.  I deducted a star because I only had a weeks worth and didn’t notice a real difference in that time compared to less expensive serums I’ve used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this #freeproduct from Topbox. This had a very strong smell that I did not enjoy. It was actually hard for me to put on. I found the texture nice. Blended nicely into my skin. I have combination skin and found this made me breakout after  one use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product worked really well with my skin. It left it feeling soft, smooth and evened out my skin tone. I used this product under makeup and without makeup. Thank you to Topbox and Clarins who sent me a one week trial for my honest review #topboxcircle #topbox #tryitfree #freeproduct

The scent is wonderful, not too overpowering - one of the many reasons I fell in love with the product! It wasn’t very oily, which I really appreciated considering the fact that my skin is, and it’s not thick which makes the application super smooth. It evened out my skin tone and improved its dullness. Needless to say, I will be purchasing the full size of this product! #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: #freeproduct  I was lucky to receive a sample of Topbox Double Serum Light Texture, and I've been thoroughly impressed. What's more, the scent is pleasant without being overpowering. This serum left my skin feeling hydrated and refreshed. It's definitely a skincare gem worth trying!

reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this serum. It worked so well on my combination skin, to make it very soft and moisturized. It absorbed easily and applied smoothly. I highly recommend this product. I received this product free to try through #tryitwithtopbox

reviews.review_text: I got this #freeproduct sample one weeks worth and it was very nice to try out. My skin felt smooth and product was lightweight. I would recommend if in your budget!

reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review.  I can honestly say that after using this for a full week, my skin has felt noticeably smoother, softer and more hydrated.  I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_text: This serum is fantastic – nothing else really compares! It will leave your skin dry and soft after a couple days of using. No sticky texture or residue sitting on top of your skin. It is expensive but perhaps you do get what you pay for and you are worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this free packet of 7 double serum samples to try for my honest review. I use serums right after hopping out of the shower to retain moisture and this serum does a great job of retaining moisture while hydrating my skin. However, I did not notice any immediate changes or regeneration. I did notice my skin texture is slightly smoother and radiant overall. #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very lucky to be able to try the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture through the Topbox Circle (#TryWithTopbox) program.  I've been using the serum for 8 days, which is the total of samples I got (#freeproduct) to test and I can say that my skin really feels smoother and more luminous. I've been using it during my morning routine, the texture is very light so it's ideal to use it during the day before a moisturizer and daily makeup. The formula is full of natural ingredients (curcuma, aloe vera, avocado, among other fruits and plants). It is ideal for all skin types, even sensitive, combination or oily skin because although it has an oily texture, the absorption is incredibly good and efficient. It is suitable even for men, because immediately after applying it, it is absorbed. I really liked the serum, the scent is not invasive and my skin is very radiant and hydrated. Excellent quality and without a doubt, I recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Leaves the skin feeling plump and hydrated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves the skin feeling plump I got this as a #free 7-day sample from #trywithTopbox. I'm sure you already know this, but I just wanted to tell you that Double Serum Light is the most amazing product I've ever used. It makes my skin so soft and luminous -- it's like I had a full night's sleep and drank 8 glasses of water before I woke up! I just wish the scents in your products will be toned down a little bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my review (#trywithtopbox). I really enjoyed using this product. It didn’t irritate my skin at all, made it feel hydrated and soft. It was easy to use, I used it during my night routine and woke up and skin felt great. #freeproduct

My skin feels hydrated and moisturized while leaving a lightweight, smooth finish. Overall, my skin is left with a nice radiant glow while helping reduce fine lines, wrinkles and loss of firmness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: week. The packaging was very simple and easy to use, and the scent was nice and subtle. This product left my skin feeling very hydrated and gave it a glowy look, which I love! I didn't see much difference in terms of texture but I think with continued use, there would be a more noticeable difference. Overall, I'd recommend this product to my friends! #freeproduct

reviews.review_text: This new lightweight version is one of those multi-tasking formulas that do it all – promising to boost radiance, while also locking in moisture, which essentially helps to tackle visible signs of ageing.   The best part? It's also suitable for all skin types and can be used morning and night. It is perfect for those who prefer a lighter texture for their serum

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

This serum is light and effective in maintaining a natural glow.  It is  easy to apply which makes my skincare routine easy. I will definitely use this as part of my skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

I would say you can probably achieve the same results with cheapers products but this is an all-in-one product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was absolutely excited to try the new light serum from Clarins because I never was a fan of the original double serum. The new product impressed me from the first application.  Very lightweight, nicely scented with some fresh and citrusy notes, no greasy or sticky finish, constant hydration!  After 7 days of using the serum, my complexion became more radiant, and the skin, in general, looked more cared, smooth and plump. I would not be able to comment on anti-aging aspects of the serum due to the lack of the product received for testing.  Will definitely consider buying a full-size product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was fortunate to be able to try the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture through the Topbox Circle (#trywithtopbox) program. The serum has a faint, pleasant scent. It can be applied to the face and neck in the morning and/or the evening. Absorbing easily, the Clarins Double Serum Light Texture seemed to do as advertised in brightening my complexion and firming my skin. I like how the product can be used by many skin types. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Clarins Double Serum for the past seven consecutive days and have really noticed a difference in my skin’s appearance. I apply it every morning and it is instantly hydrating and I find that the unique mixture of oils absorbs beautifully into my skin and deeply nourishes it throughout the day. It is extremely gentle on my sensitive skin and does not cause me to break out at all, plus it works well under makeup. The overall texture of my skin is much smoother, and my fine lines are less noticeable thanks to the overall boost in hydration. I have definitely seen a transformation in my skin and it looks so healthy and more radiant after each use. I would recommend this skincare! *I received this product free for testing purposes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I even found that it was easier to apply my concealer. It really leaves a nice glow on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! This is my first time trying Clairns double serum light texture, and im in love with everything about it. I love mixing these 2 power house serums together in my palms and patting into my skin after cleansing and toning. I was anticipating a sticky oily feel, but my skin ate this serum up, and my face and neck have never felt so soft and smooth. I was planning on using double serum at night time, but the way my skin felt after application, I decided to use it the next morning as well, as my only skincare step. My skin feels hydrated all day long and has a beautiful soft glow when I apply the serum under my makeup. I only use a small dime sized amount, as it seems pretty concentrated. My sensitive skin was not irritated at all, even with the soft, clean fragrance inside. I can't say enough great things about the light texture version of Clairns double serum. Hands down one of my favorite skincare products of all time. Luckily, I was chosen to try a seven day sample as a free product and will definitely be purchasing  in the very near future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used it at night for 7 days and even in such a short time I noticed the effect of this serum.  The skin became softer, rested, and brighter.  Wrinkles, of course, did not disappear, but they became less visible.  The serum itself has a very pleasant, oily consistency, but it absorbs quickly and does not clog pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this product! I received credit card sized samples of the clarins double serum light texture from #Topbox . The serum consisted of two parts - a clear gel  and a golden amber colored gel that had to be mixed together and then applied to the face. The serum has a pleasant fresh floral scent.  I am 45 years old and have combination skin  When I tried the previous version of this serum, my skin felt slightly tacky after applying the serum. However, after applying this light texture version, I did not notice this at all. The light serum serum was absorbed instantly and made my skin feel plump and hydrated. I applied my usual face moisturizer on top of my skin after using the serum and there was no pilling. I used the serum day & night and my skin looked great after each use. #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried both the light and then original and love both! It gives me hydrated skin and makes it feel plump! It's lighter than the orginal but still works just as good! I am loving this especially for daytime and warmer days.  Gifted by Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a nice high quality serum. I love the smooth texture when I apply it to my skin. It absorbs really well. I’m a few days off using it I’ve noticed a slight improvement in my fine lines. gifted by Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins gifted me their Double Serum Light and here's my thoughts.. I'm obsessed with the iconic original Double Serum (have gone thru 3 bottles) so I knew I had to grab this gem and try it out. And I love it. It's exactly the same but with a lighter texture designed more for oily skin or humid climates. The light version is PERFECT for summer or morning routines as it feels lighter on the skin. Its such an effect serum. Be patient with it as it does take time to see long term results but its 100% worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gentle daily serum has a lightweight, watery gel texture that absorbs quickly into the skin. I use it daily under my moisturizer and makeup with zero irritation. I still need to use it further to attest to its corrective claims, but it does give an overall brightening effect and dose of hydration I enjoy. It leaves my skin moisturized and bouncy. Gifted by Clarins, but opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited that Clarins made a lighter version of their famous double serum because the original formula is way too heavy for my acne-prone skin. I love how much lighter this one is, and so far, no breakouts. The texture is like water! I’ve only been using it for a few days, but the original one broke me out immediately. Gifted by Clarins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Clarins and it felt incredibly nice on the skin! It absorbed quickly into the skin and left my skin feeling hydrated and not greasy at all. It has a very distinct floral scent so if you are sensitive to fragrance I would be mindful of that but I loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Clarins. This is one of my absolute most favorite serums! I used to hate taking pictures because of this, but no more! This serum is magic in a bottle!

This is my third bottle, and it continues to impress me with its effectiveness. Highly recommended for those with oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

Totally worth checking out.

reviews.review_title: Clarins #1 Seller Just Got Even Better! 💛
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins has always been a brand on my wishlist. Thankfully Clarins gifted me their Double Serum Light Texture complimentary for my honest opinion. 💛  As this is my first Clarins product, I can’t compare it to the original. But I can say that I am really impressed with this anti-aging serum and its texture! Double Serum is Clarins’ number one selling serum, but in a light texture. The new lightweight texture is ideal for oily skin and those living in warm or humid climates. 💛  Living in Tennessee it gets pretty warm and humid, and this serum has been wonderful! Not only is it addressing my anti-aging needs, but it is super lightweight and perfect for all the rainy, humid weather we have been having! I have severely dry, dull, aging skin and this serum is literally transforming my skin. My skin is appearing more radiant, it’s super smooth and hydrated, my fine lines are less apparent and my skin is appearing firmer. 💛  I really love how easily this absorbs into my skin, with zero stickiness or oiliness. I am shocked, I would have imagined this serum to leave my skin feeling oily, but it doesn’t. It has a light fragrance that I don’t mind, it actually smells delicious. It contains amazing ingredients like Turmeric, Mango, Kiwi, Beauty Berry, Oat, Cocoa, Banana and Quinoa. I love the way my skin feels and looks from adding this Clarins Double Serum in the new light texture into my daily routine. This is definitely a serum I would love to always have in hand! 💛

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried both the regular and now the light, really loving this light serum for the summer. Feels very hydrating and plumped up my fine lines beautifully. Makes my skin feel so soft, too. Gifted by clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum. It also smells really nice - kind of like a sweet, slightly licorice scent, not sure how to explain it but it’s luxurious. Gifted by Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the first time I applied the serum, it instantly hydrated my skin. The skin felt soft and smooth. Yes, it is very lightweight and feels like nothing on the skin, yet super nourishing. It absorbs fast and doesn't leave any greasiness. It has a subtle scent of freshness that I love so much. With continuous use, I noticed more suppleness and firmness in my face and more radiant. From the packaging to the texture to the feel of the skin, this serum speaks luxury.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Clarins. I incorporated this into my night time skincare routine and I love how lightweight this product is on my skin. It’s incredibly hydrating and leaves my skin visibly plump every morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from Clarins. I have oily skin and work definitely recommended this light version. It absorbs into the skin quickly doesn't leave your skin oily. It has a light sticky texture  on your skin which makes   a great base to apply foundation. These 2 weeks I have felt my skin more smoother. I haven't much improvement just yet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ** gifted by Clarins ** I’ve been loving using this product in my routine! It absorbs easily, helps with my dark spots and fine lines. I would definitely recommend this for people who want to get started with a skincare routine for anti-aging, but aren’t sure about what  ingredients they need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is stunning! The original is one of my favorites but I tend to gravitate towards lighter textures in the summer due to my oil skin. Well not anymore because this light version has a thinner texture that absorbs so nicely and works better for my oily skin in the summer. It leaves my skin feeling supple and with the right amount of hydration. My skin has a radiant glow when using this, I love! This product was complimentary from Clarins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have received this product complimentary from Clarins. My review is honest and based on my experience testing it. I have been a big fan of the original version of this serum, so when the light texture formula came on the marked I was curious to test it out. This serum did not disappoint. I have sensitive combination skin and I really enjoyed its lightweight texture. I usually use this product at night and my skin just drinks it right away. Use this one sparingly, because a little bit goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like this serum is the only serum you need in your routine. It really does it all- plumping, hydrating, and firming your skin. I even noticed that my skin tone was more even. It really helped me be more confident in my skin without makeup. The wrinkles and lines are nowhere near as noticeable. Gifted by Clarins and very thankful as I think I have found my holy grail product!

reviews.review_title: If You Have Oily Skin Like Me…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Clarins in exchange for my review. I’ve been using this for a few weeks now and have really come to enjoy it. Has a silky like oil slip that it gives your skin while it is soaking in and takes a bit before you can use moisturizer. Has a really nice scent as well! I’ve noticed an improvement in my skins brightness since using, my face no longer looks dull. Apart from that, if there’s been any other improvements I haven’t noticed them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Clarins products. I've been so excited to try their Double Serum Light. I absolutely love how lightweight it's and how fast it absorbs.  I usually use it in the pm. It visibly firms my skin, smoothes it, and gives maximum hydration. I noticed that little wrinkles are becoming less visible. Gifted by Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins gifted me their Double Serum Light. I mix this in the palm of my hand and then apply. It sinks right into my skin without feeling heavy or greasy. I have been using it almost 2 weeks and love the way my skin looks.  The fine lines around my eyes look smoother and my face looks luminous and glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Clarins. I had previously tried the regular Double Serum and found it to be too heavy for my skin and I had a few breakouts from it. When I saw there was a light option I knew I needed to try it. I have normal/combo skin with dullness, texture, fine lines and enlarged pores. After trying this one I can say it's definitely the way to go for my skin type. It has a similar texture to the original but feels so much lighter on my skin. Rather than a cream in the mix this one has another very thin fluid that mixes very easily and sinks into my skin quickly. I didn't experience any breakouts with this one and I feel it's made my skin look more radiant. I had a bit of crepe-y skin under my eyes that has started to smooth out and my texture has improved as well. If you have finicky skin and need a lighter serum this is the way to go! I also love that you can dial in exactly how much you want it to dispense so that you're never getting too much or too little.

reviews.review_title: the bast skin serum on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: not gifted by clarins, paid with my own money. yes it's pricey but I believe u get what u paid for and I would buy this over and over. 49 year old skin loves this! so light weight, helps even out my skin tone and texture. two pumps is all I use so it should last a minute!  run out and get it, you will have zero regrets! hey clarins may I have a bottle to try🤣  tereda

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this in my night time routine. It has been two weeks, I have noticed a difference so far which I understand since it may take few more weeks I guess. But it keeps my skin hydrated and it is pretty lightweight, so it is working for my skin. (I was kindly gifted by Clarins).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Clarins.I’ve been using this product for the past week and it’s been a great addition to my nightly routine! The serum spreads across my skin easily and absorbs quickly after application. The adjustable pump is also a huge plus for getting the right amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have mixed feelings on this serum. It's a thinner consistency with a 'mature' scent that dissipates quickly. It feels nice and hydrating on my mid 30s, dry, skin and it plays well with all my skincare. I've been using it for 2+ weeks now and I haven't noticed any significant improvements since using this serum. Which is a bummer considering the price (I was kindly gifted by Clarins).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this serum complimentary from Clarins for my review. This serum is a classic fave for a reason - it’s so good!! It leaves my skin hydrated and super glowy. You only need a small amount at a time, so this bottle will last a good long while. It absorbs beautifully and works great for my normal skin. Layers really nicely with my other skincare and makeup.  Now that this is part of my routine, I don’t think I’ll ever be able to go without it! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This luxurious serum is everything I hoped it would be! I was gifted by a Clarins but my thoughts are 100% my own. It sits beautifully under makeup and doesn’t pill. I also enjoy the soft scent; it is a joy to apply! I am currently using the serum 2x a day and it is easily my new favorite in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this in the morning after my toner and wow !! I love the glowing effect it has on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I mean it is super pricey but the results do not lie! It made my skin feel glowy but not oily, so hydrated and soft, I loved it without lying I have seen much improvement in skyn texture and hydration, complimentary from clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this serum complimentary from Clarins. I’m really digging this serum. I use it together with the double eye serum and I absolutely love it. It can leave a bit of a slick almost oil-like feeling on the skin but it doesn’t last and it isn’t sticky at all. I haven’t been using it very long but my skin has been feeling more hydrated and plump.

I use the original Double Serum so I was super excited to try out the new Double Serum Light.  The light version is just as good as the original but not as heavy so it’s perfect to use in the morning before makeup or during the warmer months when my skin is not as dry.  Such a luxurious serum that leaves my skin so supple!  This was gifted by Clarins.

reviews.review_title: Love this addition to my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Double Serum Light was gifted by Clarins for me to try, and this is my honest opinion. I’ve been using for a little over a week, once per day, as a part of my morning skincare routine. First impressions: smells WONDERFUL (not floral or fruity, but a fresh, pretty, subtle fragrance); the packaging is very pretty, high-end, and it looks really nice on my bathroom counter. I like that I can adjust how much product comes out in one pump (there are 2 settings- I’ve found the larger amount is just right for my face and neck). I really like this serum; it’s very light, not greasy feeling, and just enough oil to act as my moisturizer in warm weather. During winter I would probably need additional moisture. It leaves me glowing and feeling like I don’t need makeup. I feel like it has also reduced some fine lines and smoothed out my skin. It feels really nice on, absorbs quickly, and has been a great addition to my skincare. My hair is up in the before picture; same time of day, same room, same lighting, and no makeup at all. This was at night after my nighttime skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is great! I feel like it made a big and noticeable difference for my skin in just few uses. Definitely made my skin look a lot brighter and plump! I just pump few drops and apply it on my skin and neck! Really nice for oily skin. Definitely a must try. Gifted by clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This clarins serum is soooo luxurious and phenomenal! I absolutely love how it smells and feels on my skin! Definitely try it out, it’s amazing and I love it! Definitely an amazing purchase you will love! Gifted by Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who’s never tried this serum, gifted by Clarins, I was honestly impressed! It is a little strange at first to get used to switching between the two, but once you get the hang of it you’re set! This stuff at first felt like it wasn’t going to absorb easily into my skin & leave a greasy residue. It did neither! In fact, once I had applied it all over, it wasn’t long before I touched my face again & realized how smooth & soft it felt! Overall I really enjoyed this product & would recommend it to others.

reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Clarins in exchange for my honest review. This serum made my skin feel soft and supple. I have not noticed too much difference in the fine lines and wrinkles but I saw that this did help improved my skin's texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Clarins: I have used the original double serum for the longest time now - so excited to see a light version for hotter months it feels lighter and perfect for oily skin type. The original can be slightly heavy in the summer this is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thankful of this product. I appreciate how well it complements my skin type. I also appreciate that it doesn't leave my skin sticky. complimentary from Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Clarins in exchange for my honest review. I have combo, acne-prone skin, so I was excited to see a light version of this serum. I have not tried the original, however, so I can't compare the two. I like that the packaging has a pump and that you can select how much product you want to come out. I find that even on the highest setting, I still have to use two pumps to cover my face. I have tried this both in the morning and at night. It is light enough to wear under makeup, but I prefer using it at night, as it does feel somewhat oily on the skin. My skin feels very hydrated after using it, but I can't speak to the long-term effects yet.Overall, I like this serum, but I'm not sure I would pay full price for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: so good for warm weather hydration

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so amazing. I am trying not to get Botox for a while and this is helped with my fine lines and expressions. It’s a little pricey but I definitely see why the results are amazing. I was gifted by Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this formula! I have oily skin so I've been hesitant to try any product that has oil but when I saw this new light formula,I knew it was the right time. You can feel it's water based with a little oil. You can also control by twisting the top how much to dispense. I use the lighter setting as a little goes a long way. It has a light floral fragrance and it literally absorbs within 2 to 3 seconds. I LOVE the way it makes my skin feel and look healthy and vibrant. You WILL 100% start to see a difference in the first week. Fine lines will be less prominent and your skin will have a beautiful glow. I cannot speak highly enough about this brand. They ALWAYS impress me. I highly recommend you get a bottle ASAP. I will never let myself run out because it's just that good. Gifted by Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I didn’t think I could love anything more than the original double serum, but the light is it for me! It is so hydrating without being an oily or greasy serum, and it leaves my skin looking so glowy! I received this gifted by Clarins.

reviews.review_title: Just as great as the original, but lighter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Clarins’ Double Serum for quite some time and I absolutely love it so I was very excited to try this Double Serum Light gifted by Clarins.  The new texture feels great and is much lighter than the original.  I was actually wondering if it would be able to get me the same results, and it absolutely does. As someone who lives in a warm climate, I think this serum is going to really be amazing during Summer.  It has everything I love about the original formula, and it’s lighter texture absorbs even easier into my skin while still providing a healthy hydrated glow.  It also has the same adjustable dial so I never over use and waste any product.  I will start rotating between the traditional and Light formulations as I think this one is a better consistency for my skin in the warmer months, but you really can’t go wrong with either formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Clarins' Double Serum has been around seemingly forever and has become a crowd favorite over the years. It's definitely one of the brand's most popular - if not THE most popular - product in their line. By and large, dermatologists seem to agree that it's a nice formula but nothing terribly out of the ordinary or necessarily unique but loyal fans staunchly stand by the fact that the Double Serum is practically a miracle worker for their skin. I tried the original version years ago and enjoyed it but didn't find that it had any notable long-term effects that made me feel the need to repurchase it.  This serum (which was gifted by the brand) is the lighter weight sister of the original version but I think that it feels every bit as delightful as what I tried years ago. I honestly do really enjoy how it feels on my skin and it absolutely provides the hydration that my dry skin appreciates. The packaging feels luxe and the product itself is conveniently dispensed through a pump top. The serum feels substantial without being cloyingly heavy and it somehow sinks into the skin but yet manages to still create almost a pillowy veil of moisture over the skin's surface. Clearly I really do like using this. However, despite all of its good qualities I still don't see any kind of lasting, long-term, anti-aging benefits from using this. The results, though delightful, are temporary and for the high price tag it may not be worth it to a lot of people.  Would I purchase it at a discounted price or during a sale? Possibly. However, for my myself I don't think I could justify purchasing it at its full retail value.

reviews.review_text: I have the original Clarins Double serum and I would use it every other day but with the Double light serum I definitely feel like I can use it twice a day because I have oily skin and this serum don't make my skin feel heavy at all! It feels firmer and smoother. complimentary from Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the have the thicker version if this serum and loved how much it hydrated and smoothed my skin. I have dry skin and it was perfect for cold winter air. This one is so light and perfect for upcoming summer. Still love the separate water and oil pump, consistency and easy application. It absorbs into the skin super quick, leaving it ready for. My previous thicker Double Serum lasted about three months, this is the same. The only con I don’t like, I prefer fragrance free products and this had some (not too strong) scent to it. Gifted by Clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the new lighter version of the serum. I really like the light weight of the serum as it doesn’t feel heavy and sticky on the skin. So I would say it is a perfect for a person with a oily skin. It has turmeric which is very good for skin. And the 21 plant extract does wonders for skin. But for my dry skin I prefer the old formula Gifted by clarins

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a fan of Clarins for years and this is truly their star product. I love the way the serum feels on my face and how it sits underneath make up. I have noticed a lot of brightening and help with the texture of my skin. I love the light version because it feels so incredibly light weight. It is amazing and a new staple in my routine! Gifted by Clarins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Clark a has the best serums and I have used their products for years. I love the original Double Serum, however during the summer months, it can be a little heavy as I live in a humid climate. This light serum is fantastic. It’s lighter and absorbs more quickly and gives me exactly what I need during the summer months. I think I will continue to use the original during the winter months when my skin is drier.  Gifted by Clarins.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this serum! It’s perfect for my oily skin. It’s lightweight but it really packs a hydrating punch! It applies nicely and absorbs efficiently. It has a very slight pleasant scent which I like. It hydrates my skin so well and really gives me that glow from within.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is perfect for more mature skin. I love that it has a dual formula system with an oil and water-based serum in one product.   At first, I thought even this light formula may be too heavy for me but I was mistaken! It sinks into the skin almost immediately. After I use this, I can definitely see that my skin is brighter with less noticeable hyperpigmentation and dark spots.   I was gifted by Clarins this serum in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: A lighter take on a classic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the double serum years ago and I was very impressed! I am so excited to have a lighter version for the coming spring and summer months. This gives my skin an instantly radiant finish. My skin looks glowy and plump without looking greasy and I get a healthy glow all day! I love that it contains turmeric for anti inflammatory purposes as well as I use this mainly at night time but also during the day if I need an extra boost of radiance. The bottle is iconic and the formula is great, I have nothing bad to say about this product! I received this product complimentary from Clarins but this is my honest opinion.
